titles.title: "Himitsu Dattsu to Yorokonde Barashita Garu Yasu ga Irushi!" by Chisame "Chiu Chiu mo Okocchauzo Bunbuun" by Chiu
Dites un secret à un imbécile, il le répètera à coup sûr. Chiu-chiu va se fâcher aussi. Grrr !
There`s a Bastard Who Gets All Happy with Secrets, Then Reveals Them, and It Really Pisses Me Off. Chiu-Chiu Is Going to Get Angry Too! Really Mad!
「秘密だっつーと喜んでバラしたがるやつがいるし!」by千雨 「ちうちうも怒っちゃうぞ~♪ ぷんぷ~ん♪」byちう
